/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a large building with a distinctive red roof stands out, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette of the cityscape.
